column4: OK I installed gstreamer, and ffmpeg -- sound recorder still doen't have a "mp3" option.  Can anyone recomend a replacement for "Sound Recorder"  (preferably small) that will record directly to mp3?
i would rather just convert whatever format made by GNOME sound recorder to mp3 in that case
e.g.  ffmpeg -i  input.wav   -ab 128k output.mp3   # -ab specify bit rate
